title: Merger & Acquisition Risk Assessment
description: A GRC analyst must perform a high-level cybersecurity risk assessment of a company that is being acquired.

tasks.description: Conduct external reconnaissance of the target company's internet footprint to look for obvious security issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst discovers the company is exposing several unpatched, legacy systems to the internet.

tasks.description: Review public reports of past data breaches or security incidents involving the target company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst finds the company suffered a major ransomware attack two years ago.

tasks.description: Create a high-level risk report for the M&A team, highlighting the potential costs of remediating the target's poor security posture post-acquisition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst provides a valuable input to the M&A due diligence process, potentially impacting the acquisition price.
